### Educational and Library Services for Dorchester Penitentiary

#### Reference Number: 21208-24-4441674/A

**Government of Canada Tender Notice**
=====================================

**Title:** Educational and Library Services for Dorchester Penitentiary

**Closing Date:** December 4, 2023, 13:00:00 (EDT)

**Tender Description:**

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is soliciting proposals for the provision of educational and library services at the Dorchester Penitentiary.

**Objective:**

The objective of this contract is to provide educational and library services to inmates at the Dorchester Penitentiary, Minimum and Medium sectors, and Shepody Healing Centre. The contractor must deliver a range of educational services, including adult basic education, adapted education programs, and post-secondary programs, as well as library services. The contractor must provide seven (7) teachers/instructors, one of whom must be bilingual and qualified to teach in both official languages, and one library technician.

**Deliverables:**

* Seven (7) teachers/instructors, who must deliver 35 hours of teaching services per week, Monday to Friday
* One library technician, who must deliver 30 hours of library services per week, with flexible hours between Monday and Friday
* Provision of adult basic education program (ABE), adapted ABE programs, education programs leading to the Adult High School Diploma, and post-secondary programs
* Coordination of post-secondary prerequisites, correspondence courses, and other programs
* Provision of provincially recognized certificates, following course and level completions
* Attendance and other records, as well as reports and data analysis, using the Offender Management System (OMS)

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Lowest Cost-per-Point

**Trade Agreements:**

The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Jurisdiction:**

New Brunswick

**Regions of Delivery:**

New Brunswick

**Contact Information:**

* Jolaine Amos, Contracting Authority
* Phone: (506) 269-3787
* Email: [jolaine.amos@csc-scc
